title: Identify the Tool's Purpose
text: The 'Format as Currency' tool is used to change the appearance of numbers.

title: Focus on Currency
text: This tool adds a currency symbol to the numbers.

title: Consider the Symbol
text: The tool ensures that numbers are displayed with a currency symbol like $ or €.

title: Think About Number Formatting
text: The tool formats numbers to look like monetary values.

hintAnswer: To display numbers as currency with a currency symbol
title: Select the Correct Function
text: The primary function of the 'Format as Currency' tool is to display numbers as currency with a currency symbol.
choices: To change the font style of text
To display numbers as currency with a currency symbol
To sort data in ascending order
